text.2_Chapter, 24_Verse: Pray let me cross over and see the good land that is on the other side of the Jordan, this good mountain and the Lebanon.
text.11_Chapter, 4_Verse: But only to the place which the Lord your God shall choose from all your tribes, to set His Name there; you shall inquire after His dwelling and come there.
text.11_Chapter, 8_Verse: For you have not yet come to the resting place or to the inheritance, which the Lord, your God, is giving you.
text.32_Chapter, 11_Verse: And of Benjamin he said, "The Lord's beloved one shall dwell securely beside Him; He protects him all day long, and He dwells between his shoulders."
